item.title: Buffalo Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 8 tablespoons unsalted butter (1 stick) 3/4 cup Frank’s hot sauce 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce 1/2 teaspoon cayenne 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder 3/4 teaspoon celery seed Notes add more cayenne to increase heat Directions combine everything except the butter in a saucepan heat it up, but do not boil add cold butter 1 pat at a time while stirring when butter melts add another pat when all butter is incorporated remove from heat Notes at least when working with dairy-free butter, carefully manage the heat it needs to be hot enough to melt the butter, but any hotter will ruin the sauce

item.title: Carolina Red Barbecue Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 3/4 cups apple cider vinegar 1/4 cup ketchup 1 1/2 teaspoons brown sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon dried crushed red pepper Directions stir all ingredients in a small bowl until sugar and salt dissolve

item.title: Gochujang Wing Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons butter 2 tablespoons gochujang 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon minced garlic 2 teaspoons minced ginger or 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger 2 tablespoons honey 2 tablespoons rice wine or water 1 tablespoons rice vinegar or white vinegar Directions mix all ingredients in saucepan over medium heat

item.title: Hot Honey Glaze
item.description: Ingredients juice of 1 lime 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce 1 clove of garlic 1/4 cup honey 1/4 cup hot honey Directions combine all ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat Use brush on chicken during the final phase of cooking

item.title: Stir Fry Sauce
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup chicken broth 1/3 cup soy sauce 2 tablespoons sesame oil 2 tablespoons honey 2 tablespoons minced ginger 3 cloves minced garlic 1 tablespoon corn starch red pepper flakes (to taste) Directions mix all ingredients together add to stir fry
